argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tchval.n | |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) |
| 2 |  | tchnmval.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tchnmval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | tchnmval.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_tchnmfval | |- ( W e. Grp -> N = ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( W e. Grp -> ( N ` X ) = ( ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = X /\ x = X ) -> ( x ., x ) = ( X ., X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_anidms | |- ( x = X -> ( x ., x ) = ( X ., X ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = X -> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( X ., X ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) = ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( sqrt ` ( X ., X ) ) e. _V |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( X e. V -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ` X ) = ( sqrt ` ( X ., X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( W e. Grp /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` X ) = ( sqrt ` ( X ., X ) ) ) |
